title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Statistical structures of turbulence; two-dimensional flow structures and effect of roughness; measurements of turbulence; three-dimensional flow structures driven by turbulence; secondary currents; diffusion and dispersion; turbulence model calculations; Coherent structures; bursting phenomena; large scale vortical motions; physical models of coherent structures; numerical simulations of coherent structures; wave boundary layer.
